CARDINAL . On DATE the Federal Law on Lay Judges of ORG in GPE ( “ the LAW ” or “ LAW ” ) came into effect . By DATE ( CARDINAL ) of the LAW , lay judges are persons authorised to sit in civil and criminal cases as non - professional judges .

CARDINAL . Section CARDINAL provides that lists of lay judges must be compiled for every district court by local self - government bodies , such lists being subject to confirmation by the regional legislature . Section CARDINAL determines the procedure for selection of lay judges . It provides that the president of a district court is to draw random lots from a list of lay judges assigned to that court . The number of lay judges assigned to every professional judge should be CARDINAL times as many as that needed for a hearing .
